resources.string: We\'re facing some difficulty. Please close and re-open this app again.
Please provide all required permissions to use Furniture Drop AR tool.
Can\'t take screenshot without having required permissions.
Help button will show this tooltip, anytime you need help.
This will show a list of 3d furniture models, select an item from the list to add model in your environment.
Take a screenshot, this will be saved in your phone gallery.
Tap on a furniture and click on this icon to remove furniture from screen.
Select a furniture item and arrange it within any room in your home.
